channel.title: Need help preffered very experienced members PLEASE READ
channel.description: can anyone help me...? my no-ip duc is playing up: normally i get DNS is current no update needed and it does still but the face has changed from a big smiley to a blushing face and server goes offline... any ideas?

item.title: Need help preffered very experienced members PLEASE READ
item.dc:creator: @justinxg27 justinxg27
item.description:
@justinxg27 wrote:

Log into your no-ip and check if your IP is the same. Because they change sometimes.[br][br][size=1]Posted on: November 08, 2009, 07:32:50 am[/size][hr]Check you host IP which you set it up with then look at the one in the top right hand corner.

Read full topic
item.source: Need help preffered very experienced members PLEASE READ
